content.prompt: The ideas expressed in the advertisement overlook which of the following contexts that allowed for the expansion of new suburban housing developments in the 1950s?

choices.label: The sharp increase in birth rates after the war
The reliance on new roads and highways
The growth of income for middle-class families
The appeal of modern amenities to consumers

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
